tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip VARCHAR,
  destination_ip VARCHAR,
  protocol VARCHAR,
  port INT,
  bytes_sent INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip INET,
  destination_ip INET,
  protocol VARCHAR(10),
  port INTEGER,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  source_ip INET,
  destination_ip INET,
  anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    protocol VARCHAR,
    bytes_sent INT
)

CREATE TABLE anomalies (
    anomaly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    description VARCHAR,
    severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    analysis_result VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    source_ip VARCHAR,
    destination_ip VARCHAR,
    protocol VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection_rules (
    rule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_name VARCHAR,
    rule_condition VARCHAR,
    rule_action VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_analysis_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id UUID,
    analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    analysis_result VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR,
    device_type VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE network_traffic_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_ip VARCHAR(255),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    protocol VARCHAR(10),
    bytes_sent BIGINT
)

CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR(50),
    detected_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    role VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
    result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT
)
